title: Solus Budgie Linux Installation Frustration - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Solus Budgie Linux Installation Frustration - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: A Solus Budgie Linux Installation Sensation quickly turns into an Installation Frustration when The Curse strikes back against Krazy Ken! Join him for a chaotic experience as he installs Solus and takes it for a spin!  Support the show and get in the credits   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #83 - Solus Budgie Linux Installation Frustration  Krazy Ken is now on Patreon! Pledge now to help support the show and get an opportunity to be in the show's credits!   Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen
